name: Service Connection
description: BHNC serves families living in San Francisco’s Alemany and Holly Court RAD sites. A central piece of our work is connecting residents to City agencies and services in addition to providing educational, financial and health-related services. These award-winning public housing properties are home to 276 low-income seniors, adults with disabilities, and families that are engaged in ongoing community-building and neighborhood improvements.
